text: That's a very easy and beautiful jute wall hanging! You can use it for your Christmas decorations, as a school project or as a gift for your friends! More Christmas Crafts: http://bit.ly/2mIIe9E
I like this interesting decoration.  The two Christmas trees create a little heart and the two contrasting colors are like the Chinese symbols yin and yang.  Thank you.  <3
This looks so very nice. Your real did a very cool job with this.
Thank you for sharing. You're pretty jute wall hanging. Make good Christmas gifts. You have a wonderful day.
Классно!!! Красиво и с фантазией!!  Спасибо за идею!
